message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I think you'll find it's a game-changer. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1800000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1600000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value.
I understand you're looking for a fair price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1650000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1550000. I believe that's a fair price for both of us.

I understand you're trying to negotiate, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1620000.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1580000. I believe that's a fair price for both of us.
I think we're really close now, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1610000.

I think we're really close now, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it's a fair price for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1570000. I believe that's a fair price for both of us.
I think we've danced around the price enough, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1590000.
I appreciate your concessions, Alice, but I really need to get this price as low as possible. I'm willing to go up to $1580000, but no higher. I believe that's a fair price for both of us.
